rows.label: qst000601_msg0001
rows.name: Oh my!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0002
rows.name:
A Driver talking to me...
what perfect timing.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0003
rows.name:
This year we've had a bumper
crop of fruit, more than we
know what to do with.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0004
rows.name:
I was just thinking of
making my specialty fruit
pie to share with everyone!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0005
rows.name: The pie I bake is truly exquisite.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0006
rows.name:
Twaina-san's pies are reputed to
be the best in all of Torigo.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0007
rows.name:
My husband was completely won
over by my specialty pie.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0008
rows.name:
"Will you make pies for me
for the rest of my life?"
That's how he proposed[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000601_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, I'm so sorry. I get carried
away when I start talking.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0010
rows.name:
Anyway, I want to make the
pie, but I'm missing some
ingredients besides the fruit.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0011
rows.name:
The shops don't have them,
so I was hoping someone
could gather them for me.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0012
rows.name: You're a lifesaver.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0013
rows.name:
Could you please fetch me some
Hustle Hyacinth and Mint Fish?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0014
rows.name:
It just won't be as delicious
without them. I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0101
rows.name: Oh, how are you doing?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0102
rows.name:
What I need is some Hustle
Hyacinth and Mint Fish.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0103
rows.name: I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0201
rows.name: Oh, did you bring them for me?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0202
rows.name: Oh my, thank you so much.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0203
rows.name:
Now I can make my
exquisite specialty pie.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0204
rows.name:
...Or so I thought, but it
seems my stove is acting up.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0205
rows.name:
It's a custom-made stove that
my husband got for me, so it's
a real pain when it breaks.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0206
rows.name: It broke down once before.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0207
rows.name:
My husband fixed it up
in a jiffy that time.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0208
rows.name:
I fell in love with him all over
again seeing how skilled he was.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0209
rows.name:
Oh, speaking of falling in
love again, I remember when
a Bunnit got into town...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0210
rows.name: Oh, I've been talking too much again.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0211
rows.name: What was I saying?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0212
rows.name: Oh yes, the stove repair.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0213
rows.name:
My husband went out to chop
wood, so he won't be back for
a while. What should I do...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0214
rows.name: You can't fix a stove, can you?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0215
rows.name: That's it!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0216
rows.name:
Why don't you bring the craftsman
who made our stove here!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0217
rows.name:
I think Yoel-san was at
the Torigo Market...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0218
rows.name:
I'm sorry to ask you to run
another errand for me, but
could you go and get him?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0219
rows.name:
I'm so sorry to trouble you
again! I'll make sure to
reward you handsomely!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0301
rows.name:
I believe Yoel-san was
at the Torigo Market...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0302
rows.name: I'm sorry, but I'm counting on you.
